channel.title: the_source (Audio Only)
channel.copyright: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 2.5 License.
channel.itunes:summary: the_source is a video podcast/IPTV show that discusses open source and includes news, events, reviews, demos and interviews. Hosted by Aaron Newcomb & Brian Burgess.
channel.itunes:subtitle: the_source is a video podcast/IPTV show that discusses open source and includes news, events, reviews, demos and interviews. Hosted by Aaron Newcomb & Brian Burgess.
channel.itunes:author: thesourceshow.org

item.title: Episode 2 - "Attack Of The Elephants (Dream)" - June 8, 2007
item.description: It's been a long time, Where is Brian???, an interview with Bassam Kurdali of the Blender project, Elephants Dream, Cinelerra tutorial #3.
item.author: thesourceshow@gmail.com (Aaron Newcomb)
item.itunes:keywords: the_source, open source, linux, technology, podcast, podcasting, blender, cinelerra
item.itunes:author: thesourceshow.org

item.title: Episode 1 - "The Filesystem Menace" - December 23, 2006
item.description: Merry Christmas from Aaron and Brian! Pirates??? Aaron has a new phone, Brian has a new car, an interview with Matt Ahrens and Mark Maybee from Sun about the revolutionary ZFS filesystem, Cinelerra tutorial #2, we still need your help!
item.author: thesourceshow@gmail.com (Aaron Newcomb)
item.itunes:author: thesourceshow.org

item.title: Special Source 1 - "The Ohio Linuxfest" - October 7, 2006
item.description: Aaron goes to Ohio Linuxfest. Interviews with Jeff Waugh, Joe Born (CEO - Neuros) and Ted Haeger (Novell Open Audio). Co-hosted by TLLTS.
item.author: thesourceshow@gmail.com (Aaron Newcomb)
item.itunes:author: thesourceshow.org

item.title: Episode 6 - "The Return Of The Pixel" - August 10, 2006
item.description: Aaron and Brian discuss server upgrades, the latest poll, Microsoft caves in, americas army, the movies (stunts and effects), an interview with Helmar Rudolph co-founder of QUNU, Cinelerra tutorial #1, your email, we need your help!
item.author: thesourceshow@gmail.com (Aaron Newcomb)
item.itunes:author: thesourceshow.org

item.title: Episode 5 - "The (Apple) Empire Strikes Back" - May 15, 2006
item.description: Brian talks about politics and open source, Aaron has a new job, DIVA, History of the iPod, iPodLinux, iDoom, Funny iPod commercials, Fedora Core 5, Beagle, F-Spot, and more ...
item.author: thesourceshow@gmail.com (Aaron Newcomb)
item.itunes:author: thesourceshow.org

item.title: Episode 4 - "QEMU" - March 3, 2006
item.description: Aaron and Ben discuss what the show is about, Google is starting to port some applications to Linux, Korea is developing an Open Spource City, Ben wants to try out Asterisk, and an in-depth review of QEMU.
item.author: thesourceshow@gmail.com (Aaron Newcomb)
item.itunes:author: thesourceshow.org

item.title: Testing 1 2 3 - December 5, 2005
item.description: This is just some test video and audio. Nothing to see here. Keep moving. Keep moving. For more information on our setup see this story.
item.author: thesourceshow@gmail.com (Aaron Newcomb)
item.itunes:author: thesourceshow.org
